headline: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) Drops From Multiple Russell Indexes In June 2025
summary: On June 30, 2025, NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) was removed from several key Russell indices, signaling potential shifts in market confidence and sparking changes in investor sentiment. Despite this removal, the company recorded a striking 70% increase in its share price over the last quarter. This surge aligns with the broader market's upward trend, where indexes like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq recently hit new highs. Contributing factors for NRG included positive Q1 earnings results, a reaffirmed...
